import { Story, Preview, Props } from "@storybook/addon-docs/blocks";

# ButtonPopover
```import { Popover } from "../../../Components/Atom";```

ButtonPopover is popover like those found in iOS, to any element on your site
using [Button](/?path=/docs/atom-button--basic) as trigger.
<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-button-popover--0-popover" />
</Preview>

## Stories
### Link Popover

ButtonPopover using [ButtonLink](/?path=/docs/atom-button-link--basic) as trigger.

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-button-popover--link-popover" />
</Preview>

### Popover Position

Three options of position are available: **bottom-left**, **bottom-center**, and **bottom-right**.

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-button-popover--popover-position" />
</Preview>

### Hide After Clicked

Hide Popover after clicked by adding **hideAfter**

<Preview>
  <Story id="atom-button-popover--hide-after-clicked" />
</Preview>
